newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Mirvac to take control of trust.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Mirvac to take control of trust.

text.p: Property manager and developer Mirvac Limited said on Wednesday that it is to resume full ownership of BZW-Mirvac Funds Ltd, the trust management company for the BZW-Mirvac Property Funds.

This follows the decision of Barclays Bank Plc to combine its funds management activities under the Barclays Global Investors label, and refocus its strategies towards the role of an investor not manager, Mirvac said.
Managing director Robert Johnson said the trust management company would be renamed Mirvac Funds Limited and BZW Investment Management would retire from the current trust venture.
"We are also working on plans to unlock value for the unitholders in the mature trusts, and we expect to put proposals to these unitholders in the very near future," Johnson said in a statement.
